Welcome to ASP.NET Zero startup project!

In this demo, you can use the left menu to test the application. This dashboard page is just for demonstration, but all other pages and functionality are fully implemented, working and ready for production. You can add/apply your business requirements on this startup project (or remove any functionality you don't need). Thus, you can have a signification time gain to immediately start your own project requirements.

Welcome to the application. You can use the menu to start using the application. If you don't see any menu item, probably you don't have permission to see any page. Consider to ask system administration for permissions.

We need the following credentials to be able to connect to your Fortnox account

How you do it!
  1. Log in to Fortnox.
  2. Open the user menu in the top right corner and select "Manage users".
  3. Press the button labeled "Add integration", search for the integration Zwapgrid.
  4. After accepting the next step, you receive an authorization code. Copy the code (ctrl+c).
  5. Enter the code in the field above.

For us to be able to connect to your Superkoll account, you must create an app in Superkoll and enter its credentials below. To create an app, login to your Superkoll account, go into settings => apps and create a new app. We suggest you name it "Zwapgrid". When you save it you get a username and an api key, enter these in the fields below.
The account must now be activated by Zwapgrid. We will get back to you when this is done and you can log in.
An integration is a collection of flows that makes up an exchange of data between different systems and sometimes different organizations.
A flow is the definition of what data should be fetched from where, to where and in what form.
This integration has no transactions yet
A transaction is the actual transfer of data. This list will fill automatically when flows are set up and they find some data to transfer.

The access to the Web Services is controlled by an API-key that is automatically generated by Quinyx WFM for each unit. It can be found by in the unit settings under Settings > Units (then click the arrow beside the company name in the table and click the name of the desired unit), then go to the tab SMS/Integration and press the button "Show". The API-key is displayed for anyone with administrative rights.

About integration between {0} and {1}

The integration means that data can be transmitted between the systems without having to do anything. The mediation can be done from {0} to {1}. Our ambition is that everything that can be mirrored (i.e. information contained in both systems) should be mirrored between {0} and {1}. What data and when to transfer data between systems, you decide below when you start the integration. We have made some default settings that we believe are the best results for efficient handling. Just click save to set up a standard integration.

Are you stuck or have questions about how you can best do this? - call or email us directly: +46 8 580 97 160 / support@zwapgrid.com

Your NetSuite Account ID is found under "Setup -> Integration -> Web Services Preferences". If you have any questions, please refer to the NetSuite documentation or reach out to our support.

A Consumer Key and Consumer Secret is generated at "Setup -> Integration -> Manage Integrations -> New". If you have any questions, please refer to the NetSuite documentation or reach out to our support.
A Token ID and Token Secret is generated at Setup -> Users/Roles -> Access Tokens -> New. If you have any questions, please refer to the NetSuite documentation or reach out to our support.

Error during the request to NetSuite: {0}

We always try to avoid replacing existing data or add duplicates in our integrations. We do this by trying to figure out if data exist already or not, but in some cases we can't, what should we do in those cases?

We will ask you what to do every time. In the beginning you will probably receive a lot of questions, but we learn from your input and the number of questions should reduce over time. This is recommended if you have data in both source and target system and they can be difficult for us to compare.

We will always create new data in uncertain cases. This will not require any input from you, but it might lead to some duplicates. Recommended if you don't have a lot of data in receiving end. Note that we will remember what we've created before, so we will not create duplicates on data that was transferred via this integration.

We will always update/replace data in uncertain cases. This will not require any input from you, but it might lead to data in receiving system gets replaced by data from source system. Recommended if the source system should have the final word or if the data is similar in both systems.

The organization number used when registered as a customer at Regtech Solutions.

How to receive the API key?
Contact Regtech or Softronic to receive a API key.
How to create a API user?
  1. Log in to Regtech Solutions portal with BankID.
  2. Click on "BYRNS SIDOR" in the right top corner of the page.
  3. In the left side panel click "Anvndaradmin".
  4. Now click "Lgg till anvndare".
  5. In the field "Frnamn" enter value "Zwapgrid".
  6. In the field "Efternman" enter value "API".
  7. In the field "Personnummer" enter value "99999999-9999".
  8. In the field "Email" enter your organization number.
  9. Leave the field "Handlggar-id/Uppdragsa..." empty.
  10. Check "Adminrttigheter".
  11. Press "Lgg till".
  12. Done
